mapper.insert: insert into teachers(tname, tno, tpw, taddtime,taddperson) values(#{tname},#{tno},#{tpw},#{taddtime},#{taddperson})
mapper.update: update teachers set tname=#{tname}, tno=#{tno}, tpw=#{tpw}, taddtime=#{taddtime}, tupdatetime=#{tupdatetime}, taddperson=#{taddperson}, tupdateperson=#{tupdateperson} where tid=#{tid}

SELECT count( degree ) * 5 as score FROM ksda k LEFT JOIN testquestion tq ON tq.stid = k.stid LEFT JOIN students st ON st.khid = k.khid LEFT JOIN dj ON dj.khid = st.khid LEFT JOIN sj ON sj.sjid = dj.sjid WHERE k.dacontain = tq.answer and k.khid=#{khid}

SELECT zyname, sname, sjname, ( SELECT AVG( score ) FROM dj LEFT JOIN sj ON dj.sjid = sj.sjid WHERE sjname = #{sjname} ) AS avgScore, score FROM sj LEFT JOIN dj ON sj.sjid = dj.sjid LEFT JOIN students s ON dj.khid = s.khid LEFT JOIN zy ON zy.zyid = s.zyid WHERE score<( SELECT AVG( score ) FROM dj WHERE sjname = #{sjname} ) ORDER BY score
SELECT zyname, sname, sjname, score FROM sj LEFT JOIN dj ON sj.sjid = dj.sjid LEFT JOIN students s ON dj.khid = s.khid LEFT JOIN zy ON zy.zyid = s.zyid where sjname like #{sjname} ORDER BY score
